text: Šljivovica (; ) is a village in the municipality of Vučitrn, Kosovo. According to the 2011 census, the village has a population of 14 inhabitants. In the village there are the ruins of an old church and an old cemetery. ==Population== {| align="center" cellspacing="0" style="background:#f3fff3" |+ style="margin-bottom:0.5em;font-size:1.1em;font-weight:bold" | Population of Šljivovica |- bgcolor="#77dd77" | align="center" | 1948 | align="center" | 1953 | align="center" | 1961 | align="center" | 1971 | align="center" | 1981 | align="center" | 1991 | align="center" | 2011 |- | align="center" | 169 | align="center" | 187 | align="center" | 183 | align="center" | 167 | align="center" | 92 | align="center" | 102 | align="center" | 14 |} ==References== Category:Villages in Vučitrn
title: Šljivovica, Vučitrn
